DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether plasma lipoproteins and lipid responsiveness to a dietary modification is influenced by CETP gene polymorphism.
DOC.brief_title: Study the Role of Genetic Variation in the Determining Lipid Profile Response to Dietary Change
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers History of any cardiovascular diseases type 1 diabetes type 2 diabetes use of lipidlowering medications hypertension pregnancy Current intake of vitamins and supplements History of endocrin disorder
